mapper.select: -- 스탠다드 구독 내역 조회 -- select sub_lf.SUB_LF_ID, lf.LF_NAME, lf.LF_ST_COIN, lf.LF_IMG_MAIN, lf_opt.LF_OPT_NAME, lf_brand.LF_BRAND_NAME from SUBSCRIPTION subscribe join LFSUBSCRIPTIONLIST sub_lf on sub_lf.SUBSCRIPTION_ID = subscribe.SUBSCRIPTION_ID join LLIFEFURNITURE lf on lf.lf_id = sub_lf.LF_ID join LFURNITUREOPTION lf_opt on lf_opt.LF_OPT_ID = sub_lf.LF_OPT_ID join LFURNITUREBRAND lf_brand on lf.LF_BRAND_ID = lf_brand.LF_BRAND_ID where subscribe.M_ID = #{memberId} and lf.LF_SUB_TYPE = 0 and subscribe.SUBSCRIBE_STATUS = 1 and sub_lf.SUB_LF_RETURN_STATUS = 0

-- 최근 스탠다드 구독 내역 조회 --
select sub_lf.SUB_LF_ID, lf.LF_NAME, lf.LF_ST_COIN, lf.LF_IMG_MAIN, lf_opt.LF_OPT_NAME, lf_brand.LF_BRAND_NAME, subscribe.SUBSCRIBE_START_DATE, subscribe.SUBSCRIBE_END_DATE, subscription_plan.SUBSCRIPTION_PLAN_NAME from SUBSCRIPTION subscribe join LFSUBSCRIPTIONLIST sub_lf on sub_lf.SUBSCRIPTION_ID = subscribe.SUBSCRIPTION_ID join LLIFEFURNITURE lf on lf.lf_id = sub_lf.LF_ID join LFURNITUREOPTION lf_opt on lf_opt.LF_OPT_ID = sub_lf.LF_OPT_ID join LFURNITUREBRAND lf_brand on lf.LF_BRAND_ID = lf_brand.LF_BRAND_ID join SUBSCRIPTIONPLAN subscription_plan on subscription_plan.SUBSCRIPTION_PLAN_ID = subscribe.SUBSCRIPTION_PLAN_ID
where subscribe.M_ID = #{memberId} and lf.LF_SUB_TYPE = 0 and ( (#{startDate} <= subscribe.SUBSCRIBE_START_DATE and subscribe.SUBSCRIBE_START_DATE<= #{endDate}) or (#{startDate} <= subscribe.SUBSCRIBE_END_DATE and subscribe.SUBSCRIBE_END_DATE <= #{endDate}) )
mapper.update: -- 스탠다드 구독 가구반납 -- update LFSUBSCRIPTIONLIST SUB_LF set SUB_LF.SUB_LF_RETURN_STATUS = 1 where SUB_LF.SUB_LF_ID = #{productId}
mapper.select: -- 프리미엄 구독 내역 조회 -- select sub_lf.SUB_LF_ID, lf.LF_NAME, lf.LF_PR_PRICE, lf.LF_IMG_MAIN, lf_opt.LF_OPT_NAME, lf_brand.LF_BRAND_NAME from SUBSCRIPTION subscribe join LFSUBSCRIPTIONLIST sub_lf on sub_lf.SUBSCRIPTION_ID = subscribe.SUBSCRIPTION_ID join LLIFEFURNITURE lf on lf.lf_id = sub_lf.LF_ID join LFURNITUREOPTION lf_opt on lf_opt.LF_OPT_ID = sub_lf.LF_OPT_ID join LFURNITUREBRAND lf_brand on lf.LF_BRAND_ID = lf_brand.LF_BRAND_ID where subscribe.M_ID = #{memberId} and lf.LF_SUB_TYPE = 1 and subscribe.SUBSCRIBE_STATUS = 1 and sub_lf.SUB_LF_RETURN_STATUS = 0

-- 프리미엄 최근 구독 내역 조회 -- select sub_lf.SUB_LF_ID, lf.LF_NAME, lf.LF_PR_PRICE, lf.LF_IMG_MAIN, lf_opt.LF_OPT_NAME, lf_brand.LF_BRAND_NAME, subscribe.SUBSCRIBE_START_DATE, subscribe.SUBSCRIBE_END_DATE from SUBSCRIPTION subscribe join LFSUBSCRIPTIONLIST sub_lf on sub_lf.SUBSCRIPTION_ID = subscribe.SUBSCRIPTION_ID join LLIFEFURNITURE lf on lf.lf_id = sub_lf.LF_ID join LFURNITUREOPTION lf_opt on lf_opt.LF_OPT_ID = sub_lf.LF_OPT_ID join LFURNITUREBRAND lf_brand on lf.LF_BRAND_ID = lf_brand.LF_BRAND_ID left join SUBSCRIPTIONPlAN subscription_plan on subscription_plan.SUBSCRIPTION_PlAN_ID = subscribe.SUBSCRIPTION_PlAN_ID where subscribe.M_ID = #{memberId} and lf.LF_SUB_TYPE = 1 and ( (#{startDate} <= subscribe.SUBSCRIBE_START_DATE and subscribe.SUBSCRIBE_START_DATE<= #{endDate}) or (#{startDate} <= subscribe.SUBSCRIBE_END_DATE and subscribe.SUBSCRIBE_END_DATE <= #{endDate}) )
